headline: Jabil (JBL) Margin Drops on $300M Loss, Pressures Bullish Growth Outlook
summary: Jabil (JBL) posted net profit margins of 2.2%, a notable drop from last year’s 4.8%, following a one-off, non-recurring loss of $300 million that affected results through August 2025. However, the company’s EPS and top line are forecast to rebound, with earnings expected to grow at a robust 20.3% per year, which outpaces the US market’s 15.6% estimate. This dynamic has investors weighing a strong growth outlook against recent profit margin compression and episodic losses. See our full...
